data.name: pegasus_core|Button_name_Rejuvenation_Button
data.tooltip: Instantly restores <d ref="duckiesHeroKriHeal_InstantHeal.amount" style="Bold"/> health to target unit and then additional <d ref="duckiesHeroKriHeal_TickHeal.amount / duckiesHeroKriHeal_Buff.periodic_duration * duckiesHeroKriHeal_Buff.duration" style="Bold"/> health over <d ref="duckiesHeroKriHeal_Buff.duration"/> seconds.
